title: Ep 366 | Phil's Theory That Women Who Hunt Will Save America & an Unusual Opinion on Phil's Health
description:
Phil notices that more women are getting involved in hunting — a sign that there's still hope for America. Jay Stone and Nurse Chad drop by the podcast, and Chad shares his unusual opinion on Phil’s health. Jay recalls how the family met Chad and why they instantly got along. He also explains the challenges of managing the land and creating a habitat for the animals they like to eat. And Chad talks about why he believes that "iron sharpens iron," an adage that makes him want to be around godly people.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
